Name: Witch Story
About the game: In a kingdom, there is a witch who lives off the beaten track. She is busy with alchemy, potion-making, fortune-telling ,frightening people and other magic..They say she has already lived for a few centuries here. The local lord is fed up with such neighbourhood. The kingdom earned notoriety, the common people are terrified,his power is weakening. They can`t send the army to the witch, as they are not sure if the army will succeedâ€¦ And what a lord is frightened enough to raise an army against a woman? They decided to settle things quietly ,so a Hero was sent to beat her! Then another oneâ€¦ And then two moreâ€¦ Finally the Lord sends a new hero ,who has to read all accusations to the witch and take her to prison!
